roleset.name: have power over

example.name: Both args, within LVC
example.text: I do n't have control over them as I would an employee of the Daily Record or the Dispatch because they are stringers and independent .
example.arg: as I would an employee of the Daily Record or the Dispatch
because they are stringers and independent.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Mother Nature has exhibited her control over mankind with her record rainfall that brought an end to our drought cycle.
example.arg: with her record rainfall that brought an end to our drought cycle.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry control.01. Corresponding VN class is enforce-63.
